skill.description: Gain {0} additional DMG Bonus for all Attributes. The wielder is bestowed with divine blessings and gains {1} stack of Blessing of Ages for each Basic Attack strike, for up to {2} stacks, which is removed when the wielder leaves the field. At {3} stacks of Blessing of Ages or more, the wielder consumes all stacks of Blessing of Ages when casting the next Resonance Skill, with its DMG increased by {4} for {5}s. This can be triggered 1 time every {6}s.
